segment.source: A voice command is a single utterance with a specific intent, defined in a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file, directed at an installed app through Cortana.
segment.target: A voice command is a single utterance with a specific intent, defined in a Voice Command Definition (VCD) file, directed at an installed app through Cortana.

segment.source: A voice command definition can vary in complexity.
segment.target: A voice command definition can vary in complexity.

segment.source: It can support anything from a single, constrained utterance to a collection of more flexible, natural language utterances, all denoting the same intent.
segment.target: It can support anything from a single, constrained utterance to a collection of more flexible, natural language utterances, all denoting the same intent.

segment.source: A VCD file defines one or more voice commands, each with a unique intent.
segment.target: A VCD file defines one or more voice commands, each with a unique intent.

segment.source: The target app can be launched in the foreground (the app takes focus and Cortana is dismissed) or activated in the background (Cortana retains focus but provides results from the app), depending on the complexity of the interaction.
segment.target: The target app can be launched in the foreground (the app takes focus and Cortana is dismissed) or activated in the background (Cortana retains focus but provides results from the app), depending on the complexity of the interaction.

segment.source: For example, voice commands that require additional context or user input are best handled in a foreground app, while basic commands can be handled in Cortana through a background app.
segment.target: For example, voice commands that require additional context or user input are best handled in a foreground app, while basic commands can be handled in Cortana through a background app.

segment.source: By integrating the basic functionality of your app, and providing a central entry point for the user to accomplish most of the tasks without opening your app directly, Cortana becomes a liaison between your app and the user.
segment.target: By integrating the basic functionality of your app, and providing a central entry point for the user to accomplish most of the tasks without opening your app directly, Cortana becomes a liaison between your app and the user.

segment.source: Providing this shortcut to app functionality and reducing the need to switch apps can save the user significant time and effort.
